preConditions.sqlCheck: WITH enum_type_exists AS ( SELECT 1 FROM pg_type t JOIN pg_namespace n ON n.oid = t.typnamespace WHERE t.typname = 'error_report_status' AND n.nspname = '${database.defaultSchemaName}' ) SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM enum_type_exists) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM unnest(enum_range(NULL::error_report_status)) AS e(value) WHERE value = 'ERROR' ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END;

changeSet.comment: Add 'ERROR' value to error_report_status enum if it doesn't already exist
